name: authentication
description: The auth server and modules for PAYW software

scripts.dev:server: cross-env NODE_ENV=development HOST=local tsnd -r tsconfig-paths/register --transpile-only src/main.ts
scripts.dev:remote: cross-env NODE_ENV=development HOST=remote tsnd -r tsconfig-paths/register --transpile-only src/main.ts
scripts.migrate: prisma migrate save --experimental && prisma migrate up --experimental
scripts.pm2:restart: if pm2 show payw-auth ; then pm2 restart payw-auth ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for payw-auth' ; fi
scripts.pm2:stop: if pm2 show payw-auth ; then pm2 stop payw-auth ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for payw-auth' ; fi
scripts.pm2:delete: if pm2 show payw-auth ; then pm2 delete payw-auth ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for payw-auth' ; fi
scripts.pm2:reboot: npm ci && npm run build && npm run pm2:stop && npm run pm2:delete && npm run pm2:start
